p.k: This year's 50th edition will be packed with surprises: more than 400 offshore and onshore activities, the opportunity to admire the vessel Nave Vespucci, the Barcolana50 special postage stamp, and the Frecce Tricolori airshow just a few minutes before the start of the race. Stunningly huge yachts and sailboats steered by sailing enthusiasts will compete in the Regatta to mark this special edition of Barcolana50.
